description: Journeyman privateer journalist Steve Matthes chats with the biggest names in motocross in The RacerX Podcast Show brought to you by BTO Sports.com.
title: The Steve Matthes Show on RacerX

episodes.title: FXR Racing/Race Tech Privateer Island #139- Jason Butschky
episodes.description: We talk to the owner of SGB Maxxis Kawasaki Jason Butschky about why he started a team, how it's benefitting his business, his 2020 season, what he's doing for 2021, what's the next step and more. Pulpmx30 code to save at FXR Racing.com and Pulp20 code at Race Tech to save.

episodes.title: Guest: Tommy Clowers
episodes.description: Matthes calls up Tommy to talk about his great FMX career, growing up in San Diego, his early amateur mx success, turning pro, why that didn't work out for him, Red Bull and more

episodes.title: Guest: Josh Demuth
episodes.description: Matthes calls up the Sheriff Josh Demuth to talk about what he's doing now, how his fake leg is doing, his racing career, AX success, growing up in Ohio and more

episodes.title: Renthal Reaction: Malcolm Stewart Signs with Star Yamaha
episodes.description: Matthes and Paul Perebijnos break down the Malcolm Stewart to Star Yamaha news, how it came about, the prognosis for Stewart, Star running the 450 Yamaha team and more.

episodes.title: Guest: Scott Burnworth/Broc Glover
episodes.description: We call up Burnworth to talk about his annual vintage race that he held this year which featured a tribute to the late Marty and Nancy Smith, why an 87 RM125 is his choice. riding the vintage bikes and more. Then 6-time MX champion Broc Glover joins the show to talk about being at the race, his memories of Marty, riding an old Elsinore, what people want to talk to him about and more.

episodes.title: FXR Racing/Race Tech Privateer Island #137- Mike Duclos
episodes.description: We talk to the owner of Rock River Yamaha about his race team and how it's going over the years, the future of team ownership, losing a title sponsor, the riders he's worked with over the years, his 2021 racing plans, the dealership itself and more. Pulpmx30 code to save at FXR Racing.com and Pulp20 code at Race Tech to save.
